question:
Your car insurance company has told you that they are going to increase the amount you have to pay in insurance for your car each month. You are not happy about this.
Write a letter to your insurance company. In your letter explain

Why you are writing to them
Why you think the insurance should not be increased
What you want them to do
text: I am writing this missive to express my dissatisfaction with the hike in the price of insurance premiums.Although,the company is charging a hefty amount and now with this ,increase it has become very difficult for a common person to survive.

After looking at the premium of all other competitive insurance companies it is your company who is charging almost.Furthermore,I consider it provides the best services in town but on the other hand,there are companies who are giving more coverage at less cost.

It's my humble request to give some reduction in the premium amount as in this pandemic earnings from the businesses are almost nill.Also,since I am a loyal customer of the company and now it's been almost 20 years,Moreover,I am paying a regular premium to the company.Besides this,if possible please provide to option to pay on annual basis.
I hope to hear from you soon
